name: places/ChIJtdkm9iZZwokRLaGnjj6ujTE

displayName.text: New York Dog Spa & Hotel - 20th Street

formattedAddress: 145 W 20th St, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 145 W 20th St, New York, NY 10011-3601, USA

originalText.text:
Only a groom customer, have not done daycare. I think they did a great groom, and obviously everyone here loves the pets that come in and treat them each exceptionally.  They knew every dogs name coming through the door, and were especially sweet with any of the more anxious dogs. First groom with them.  Took exactly 2 hours and she looks wonderful! Was exactly what I hoped for.

Only originally 4 stars because a) the groomer Joe was 30 minutes late and while the front desk apologized several times, there wasn't any sort of complimentary service for the time lost, and b) with a $20 tip, total price was $155 which seems like a bit much for a 14 lb dog with no matting.  I will update to 5 stars if on the next groom the groomer is on time/if the groomer is not on time, they offer a discount ect.
But for the price, definitely worth the peace of mind.  Joe was obviously a natural with my dog, and she came home without any anxiety or fear after the visit.

Edit: 5 stars as Dog Spa just sent me an email with a discount for the next visit! Stuff happens, and I'm glad they went that extra mile to make it up to a first time customer. :) Thanks dog spa!

originalText.text: The kind staff at NY DOG SPA on West 20th are awesome! They care about my dog and treat him well. He has fun and gets tired out at daycare, yet can’t wait to return!

text.text: The kind staff at NY DOG SPA on West 20th are awesome! They care about my dog and treat him well. He has fun and gets tired out at daycare, yet can’t wait to return!

originalText.text: I have entrusted Dog Spa on 20th Street with the care of my dog for the past 9 months, and have been impressed with the exceptional care they consistently provide. I always receive photos of my dog having the time of her life, and am warmly greeted by the staff at dropoff and pickup. Highly recommend!

text.text: I have entrusted Dog Spa on 20th Street with the care of my dog for the past 9 months, and have been impressed with the exceptional care they consistently provide. I always receive photos of my dog having the time of her life, and am warmly greeted by the staff at dropoff and pickup. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: My 6 month old puppy has just started going here for full-day daycare sessions a couple times a week and he absolutely LOVES it. He recognized the route after the 2nd day of daycare, and now as soon as we turn onto 20th street, he starts racing to the storefront and whines out of excitement. Staff are all friendly and they send update pictures throughout the day! When he gets home, he passes out right away. We love taking him here!

originalText.text: The WORST mold in the small dog area I would not recommend bringing or having my dog spend time there knowing what they’ll be breathing in it’s unhealthy for the dogs and unhealthy and unsafe! PLEASE PLEASE DO NOT I MEAN DO NOT BRING YOUR DOG THIS BUILDING IS MOLD INFESTED !!
